original_text: Jacob believed God. As a result of his faith, he asked God to bless each of Joseph's sons. Jacob did that when he was dying. At that time, he used his stick to hold himself up while he worshipped God.
korean_text: 믿음으로 야곱은 죽을 때에 요셉의 각 아들에게 축복하고 그 지팡이 머리에 의지하여 경배하였으며

sentences.original_text: As a result of his faith
he asked God to bless each of Joseph's sons
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 요셉의 아들들 각자에게 복을 주시도록 하나님께 요청했습니다

sentences.original_text: Jacob did that when he was dying
he used his stick to hold himself up
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신을 지탱하기 위해 지팡이를 사용했습니다
